name: Duck, Duck! Poo!
description:
Duck, Duck! Poo!

A two player split screen game made for the yearly Deakin Game Development Winter Game Jam 2018. 

The design of the dame was indented to experiment on a Dual Risk vs Reward system where 2 players have one ability each - defensive and offensive. However the more the abilities are used the difficulty is increased equally for both players.

Awards Won: Best Graphics(Art Style)  & People's Choice Award.

Team:
Amshumaan Rakshith - Designer and Programmer
Rudra Kumar - Mobile Network Multiplayer Programmer (In Development)
